entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @LouisianaGov @Coach_EdOrgeron @LADeptHealth Thank you Governor for remaining calm and professional right now during your Covid-19 press conferences. Also thank you for not being overly aggressive with your decisions at this time. You are level headed and a smart man. I appreciate what you are doing for our state. 💙
